title: Retri with a Remote Detonated Nuclear Explosive

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock and redirect immune.
- You may make your raised corpse use their ability on any legal target. The corpse you target uses the ability and performs the visit. You visit the corpse.
- You learn all night feedback that the corpse would receive.
- You may not use the ability of a dead player whose corpse has already been raised by yourself or another role that can raise corpses.
- You may not use the ability of a dead player whose role is hidden.
- For every three nights that you have no legal abilities, you gain one use of your second ability. The use is gained at the start of the third night, and the nights do not have to be consecutive.
